ARABIC: وَيَوْمَ يُنَادِيهِمْ فَيَقُولُ أَيْنَ شُرَكَآءِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمْ تَزْعُمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day when He summons them He will say, 'Where are they, those you claimed were My associates?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That day God will call them and ask: "Where are they you imagined were My compeers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Let them not forget) that the Day when Allah will call unto them, and say: "Where are those whom you imagined to be My associates?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the day when He will ask (the latter group), "Where are those whom you had considered equal to Me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On the day when He will call to them – He will therefore proclaim, “Where are those partners of Mine, whom you had assumed?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) the Day when He will call to them and say: "Where are My (so-called) partners whom you used to assert"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And on the day when He will call them and say: Where are those whom you deemed to be My associates?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day when He shall call to them, and He shall say, 'Where now are My associates whom you were asserting?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On the day when He will call unto them and say: Where are My partners whom ye imagined?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On that Day He will call to them, and say, "Where are those whom you claimed to be My partners?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And on the Day whereon He shall call unto them and say: where are My associates whom ye were wont to assert?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The day He will call out to them and ask, ‘Where are My ‘partners’ that you used to claim?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That Day (Allah) will call to them, and say "Where are my 'partners'?- whom ye imagined (to be such)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) the Day when He will call to them, and say: "Where are My (so-called) partners whom you used to assert?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day He will call to them, saying: 'Where are those whom you alleged to be My associates'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On the Day when He will call to them, and say, “Where are My associates whom you used to claim?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [warn of] the Day He will call them and say, "Where are My 'partners' which you used to claim?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:62] And, mention, the day when He, God, will call to them and say, ‘Where [then] are My partners, those whom you used to claim?’, were partners of Mine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On the Day) which is the Day of Judgement (when He) i.e. Allah (will call unto them) Abu Jahl and his host (and say) and Allah, glorified is He, says: (Where are My partners whom you imagined) whom you worshipped and claimed they were my partners?
